data.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
data.author: Chinese Proverb

data.quote: If people are doubting how far you can go, go so far that you can’t hear them anymore.
data.author: Michele Ruiz

data.quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
data.author: Pablo Picasso

data.quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

data.quote: Smart people learn from everything and everyone, average people from their experiences, stupid people already have all the answers.
data.author: Socrates

data.quote: The same boiling water that softens the potato hardens the egg. It’s what you’re made of. Not the circumstances.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: People who wonder if the glass is half empty or full miss the point. The glass is refillable.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Everything comes to him who hustles while he waits.
data.author: Thomas Edison
